content: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

content: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

content: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

content: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller
